patthana15.36:1.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana15.36:2.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ anāsavaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana15.36:3.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.36:4.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā āsavavippayutto nasāsavo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā āsavavippayutto naanāsavo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
